message.body: Hey !! Are you still down for Saturday?! The film screening? Bc that sounds so enjoyable
Hey! Yes, absolutely! And you're welcome to stay over

Awesome! I can't wait. I have to open the coffeeshop at 6am unfortunately so I have to leave immediately after the film- would you be able to hang a bit before the film? For example, if I got in at 5pm?
(Like pre-film drink/early snack or just grabbing a coffee I dunno )
Oh, oy! Too bad. Hanging before would be great! Would you want to come by the studio and then drive over? I'm excited for the screening too
I could make a quick easy dinner too
So I am taking a 2:30 bolt bus and should get there at 4 yay!
Sounds great! I actually have a plan until 5 but it's just gallery going so maybe you can join up
Sorry I should have told you before as the example you have was 5pm
Haha oh that's fine- I bet it'll take me til five to actually find you anyway lol I get lost in ny h
